title: 【1.14】tellraw实时显示记分板分数（？
author: mineconan
txt_content:
有一个叫score的记分板，现在我想让tellraw说一句话：“分数是x”，且每次运行时，x都等于当时score的分数
请问这如何用1.14的指令实现？

replies.author: mlybj
replies.txt_content:
/tellraw @a [{"text":"分数为"},{"score":{"objective":"example","name":"@a"}}]
记得是这样，objeative里是计分板名称，name是该计分项的选定玩家的分数

replies.author: (=°ω°)丿
replies.txt_content:
tellraw @a ["",{"text":"分数是"},{"score":{"objective":"记分板","name":"*"}}]

把记分板改成 score。

replies.author: 阡喏
replies.txt_content:
穷举！








当然不是啦
tellraw @a [{"text":"Player"},{"score":{"objective":"计分板名称","name":"分数所属玩家"}}]
